document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Electric </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Adjunct </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">anything </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">known </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Though </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">unique </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Momentum </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Inebriate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Hope is a strange invention
